overview: Musikkurzfilme DVD includes the brand new videoclip for 'Lichtgestalt' alongside all other clips from the years 1993 to 1997. Also included is a number of 'making-ofâ€™s from several video-shoots that present an interesting view behind the scenes of this extraordinary band and ends with an enticing trailer for the upcoming Lacrimosa movie planned for 2006.
tagline: Track Listing:  Impressionen / Satura / Schakal / Copycat / Stolzes Herz / Not Every Pain Hurts / Siehst Du Mich Im Licht? / Alleine Zu Zweit / Der Morgen Danach / Durch Nacht Und Flut / Lichtgestalt
title: Lacrimosa: Musikkurzfilme 1993-2005
